alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:26PM CDT until March 30 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Eureka. Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, West Spring River Road becomes inundated at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 26.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.3 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Meramec River Eureka 19.0 19.8 9.7 8.3 7.5 6.9 6.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
